layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x52
  LayoutBlockFlow {test} at (0,0) size 800x52
    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,16) size 800x20
      LayoutBlockFlow {input} at (4,3) size 13x13 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
      LayoutText {#text} at (20,2) size 4x17
        text run at (20,2) width 4: " "
      LayoutInline {span} at (0,0) size 394x17 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (24,2) size 394x17
          text run at (24,2) width 394: "Everything in this paragraph should have a green background"
